title: No Blue Essence mission
body: All my friends got a misson where they hade to play a matchmade game to get blue essence orbs thatwas wort 6500 blue essnce in total but i didn't. Is it a glitch or what can i possibly be? Whould really appriciate an awnser. Thank you!

replies.body:
Ahhhh I see where you're confused now. That mission is there to start the refund on all of the old runes you had that [**qualified for a refund**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-update), and it doesn't look like you owned any tier 3 runes.

https://i.gyazo.com/e5a73f8c5a20ecceeba58b0409c1648e.png
